title: M-01 Mandated Intent Schema
description: Defines the mandatory schema for all M-01 Intent submissions before ingestion by IDSM (Stage 1). Ensures structural integrity, cryptographic signature provenance, and required metadata are present.

intent_id.description: Unique cryptographic identifier for this intent mandate (M-01).

target_architecture_scope.description: List of architectural components or files targeted for evolution.

payload_hash_signature.description: Cryptographic signature proving the provenance and integrity of the associated change payload (M-02).

change_rationale.description: Detailed, auditable reasoning justifying the evolutionary step.

resource_cap_proposal.description: Initial proposal for resource ceilings required for Stage 3 execution (RACM input).

governance_stakeholder_signature.description: Authentication signature from the authorizing subsystem or component.
